website_summaries.verdict: A unique way to promote balance and sensory stimulation, even indoors. And that's just the beginning.
pros: Curved beechwood board holds up to 485 pounds
Helps develop gross motor skills and balance
When used imaginatively, can serve as a step stool, tunnel, doll bed, reading rest, and more
cons: Some arrived warped, which can lead to cracks and other damage

customer_reviews.title: Endless play, great purchase
customer_reviews.text: We have 4 boys, aged 1 to 7 and they all love this board! They use it as a balance board, car ramp, bridge, roll balls over it, climbing (the baby) on it, sliding of it, rocking in it...the ways to play are endless. There are so many ways to discover heights, gravity, balance...And yes, Mom likes to balance on it too. It is sturdy enough for that. We will enjoy this for many years to come, as even our 12 year old neighbor couldn't resist balancing on it, first thing she came in today.
customer_reviews.author: Esther K.

customer_reviews.title: Warped, ends don’t lay flat on the ground
customer_reviews.text: Was really excited for this board to arrive and got a nice Black Friday deal, which is why I purchased this one. It arrived today and I took it out to see how my son would like it. He loved it but it appears to be defective. The angle of the curve appears warped causing the ends not to lay flat when in the bridge position. When one end is flat the other is over an inch+ off on the other side causing it to be very unstable for him to walk on. I’m returning it and hoped to repurchase a new one but they are now listed as unavailable. Will have to buy elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Super fun!
customer_reviews.text: Given the reasonable price for this board compared to other Waldorf-inspired wooden handmade toys, I was skeptical about its quality, but I'm so happy to find out that this board is gorgeous! It's handmade from German beech wood and super sturdy. Even my husband was able to stand on it and it didn't budge! It also has a really nice feel to the touch and is well made. My son loves rocking on it, but he has already found 101 other uses, which is what I had hoped for. I love this board and so does he. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Best TOY/Furniture EVER!
customer_reviews.text: One of the most important toys/ furniture for ALL kids 1-8yrs+ old! Buy!!! Every kid that has” met” this toy relate to it quickly and invent SO many ways to use “their” board. Great rocker seat ,recliner,walking bridge for dress-up play, slope for trucks and balls,environment for hiding dollhouse sized critters and dolls,sliding board,balance crawler/walker apparatus fun....endless! Two are even better!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nettie A.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun.
customer_reviews.text: My 2.5 year old loves to play with this. We keep finding creative ways to use it. He rides his balance bike over it, turns it into a seat, drives his toy cars over it, uses it as a bridge or mountain when he builds with his wood blocks, and of course does actually balance on and rock in it from time to time. We use it with supervision because I want to watch out for pinched/crushed fingers if he were to rock over them.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Crossley

customer_reviews.title: Versatile open ended toy for all ages
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic "overpriced board" haha. We gifted it to my son as "the" gift for his first birthday. It's gotten so much use - all the kids whether crawling babies or older kids love to play with it in different ways. I read all the reviews before purchasing, noting that it's a very versatile toy, and it's extremely accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Dash of Dirt

customer_reviews.title: Looked like fun on the website, but...
customer_reviews.text: Not much fun at all. My 5 year old jumped on it and was bored in less than 5 seconds. My 3 year old twins were less than impressed. It is very easy to stand on and rock back and forth, but balance isn't really required. It's not really suited for outdoor use in the snow or water, as it is made of wood. Can't find much fun in this $100 bent board.
customer_reviews.author: T. C. Shotwell

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I purchased this
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know how much use this toy would get. We have purchased a balance beam and after a couple of days, it was left untouched. The kinderfeets wooden board though is so versatile that our kids (ages four and seven) keep returning to it. Some days it's a bridge, other days a slide, a teeter totter, a snowboard, a bed for dolls, a pretend car... I think because it's so endless that it gets lots of play. I'm glad I purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen B

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made. Buy elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Our first one split in less than a month of use by my 16mo. We ordered a replacement and the kinderboard box inside the amazon box was completely trashed and was clearly someone else’s return. The board didn’t lay flat - one edge was an inch off the ground and resulted in the board flipping over when touched. I love these boards but this brand has some serious flaws.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan M.

customer_reviews.title: Well made, fun toy
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my three year old daughter. It is a well made, fun toy. I was worried she wouldn’t be impressed right away because she also got some noisy, colorful plastic toys But she has played with this every day since Christmas in one way or another. She figured out all sorts of ways to play with it the same day she got it. It’s a bit heavy for her to turn over, we try to step in to help when she wants to flip it. It’s also a great hip workout for mom!
customer_reviews.author: KAP

customer_reviews.title: Must-have for every child!
customer_reviews.text: O. M. G. I love this product so much, it's everything I expected and then even more. It invites my 2.5 year old daughter to open play and she has been playing with it a lot ever since we got it. She is naturally really cautious and super aware of her movements but this kinderboard makes her to practice with balance. I couldn't recommend this board even more, it's a must-have for every child!
customer_reviews.author: Elisa Bee

customer_reviews.title: Love this piece
customer_reviews.text: Gifted to our children for Xmas and enjoyed by the whole family; adults and kids alike. Really versatile toy. Love that it works on balance coordination imagination and more all at once. One thing to note: if you are gifting and going to wrap then check in the box. Ours came in a very large amazon box and the board would have been much easier to wrap if I had checked.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Scam, not actually Kinderfeets
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty sure this board is a counterfeit. I ordered a Kinderfeets balance board and what I received does not have the Kinderfeets name or logo anywhere. I am not paying $100 for a board that I have no clue where it came from or how it was made. Now I have to ship it back. What a scam!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Malone

customer_reviews.title: TOP QUALITY BALANCE BOARD
customer_reviews.text: Our kids love their new balance board. They learned bicycling as late toddlers with Kinderfeets balance bikes so we were familiar with the design, workmanship and quality. Beautiful natural wood and even sturdy enough for 6'2" almost 200lbs dad. Great fun, workout, and practice for our whole active family. (skiing, biking, skating, Skateboarding, SUP etc) We highly recommend the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Fleege

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for kiddos
customer_reviews.text: So far my 3ys old and 1yr old LOVE IT! it’s super sturdy, I was able to attach my back with it, my boys have been rough and so far no scratches or dents on the board. It’s still being explored but so far a great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Liz Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I tested it with my 153 lbs weight and it seems quite strong, though it flexed when I stood on it... which I guess is to be expected with thick layers of wood. Rocking on it even as an adult is surprisingly relaxing, ha ha.
customer_reviews.author: dreampig

customer_reviews.title: Wobble board
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun “toy” that encourages balance through play. I use this often during my twins PT sessions, and it’s been fun watching the growth and progress in balance my son has made using this. Great for all ages, even I enjoy rocking on it! My kids also use it as car tunnels/ramps, there are plenty of uses. Great piece to include in your playroom.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Owens

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy for Open Ended Play
customer_reviews.text: Completely delighted with this balance board. I love what a beautiful open ended play piece it is. It seems very sturdy, the wood grain is lovely, and my preschooler took to it right away. It looks nice in my house, it shows no issue supporting adult weight, and is a fantastic alternative to more expensive boards.
customer_reviews.author: hello, its me

customer_reviews.title: I wish they had these for adults
customer_reviews.text: These are such a simple thing, but we bought two and both my daughters (who are four years apart in age) love them. They're sturdy (my eldest daughter jumps on and off it at full speed when set up as a bridge) with no creaking or signs of breaking, and the other loves rocking in hers. I just want an adult sized one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Creative Quality Play
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this after getting a nugget. This works perfectly with it. My child uses this as a slide, a ramp for his toy cars, a balance board. My husband and I both tested the board out and it held our weights. It seems extremely sturdy. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Rocking and Rolling
customer_reviews.text: My 2 1/2 year old daughter loves it. She put it on the bookshelf and declared it was a store. Rolling cars and balls back and forth. Rocking around. Mine arrived warped, it died to sit flat upside down. The manufacturer is sending out a replacement. I see the potential and know we will get a ton of use out of this one.
customer_reviews.author: Juswatjam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a Toddler!
customer_reviews.text: Our two-year-old loves this, and I know it's something she can grow up with. She uses it as a slide, she balances on it, and she uses it for imagination play specifically with her animal figures. My husband and I also regularly use the balance board. We all love it!
customer_reviews.author: Merilyn M.

customer_reviews.title: Endless enjoyment!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our two kids for Christmas. They use it all the time in so many ways. We’ve propped it against the couch as a slide, used it to rock on, used it upside down for a slide on the floor, a pretend boat, it gets so much use! So sturdy, and grip tape could be used if you need. Great product with endless enjoyment!
customer_reviews.author: E. Maidlow

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Both me and my Son love it! He uses like ramp for his car toy, balance board and slide he is 1 year old. Worth the money quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce anne fojas

customer_reviews.title: More than just a balance board
customer_reviews.text: The balance board is very sturdy and the wood is quite beautiful. My 7-year old, who can’t sit still, likes to stand or sit on it and rock back and forth while he’s watching TV. But he will also play with it when my 4-year old uses it as a tunnel or a ramp for his toy cars. The kids take it from one room to another, depending on what they are playing with. It is actually more versatile than I thought it would be. I have used it as a balance board as well, and it is a good work-out for me, too!
customer_reviews.author: D. Westdk

customer_reviews.title: Best deal on a balance board
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 year old but my 6 year old loves it as well. Instantly upon opening it they were crawling over it, rocking in it, using it as a ramp for toy cars, they lean it up against the couch and use it like a slide. They love it. And it’s very sturdy and has a good weight to it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Purington

customer_reviews.title: Great “toy”
customer_reviews.text: Love this board. First one came defective (potential splinters) but the replacement is working just fine. Both my child and I use it. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: B.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good brand!
customer_reviews.text: Yes! Go for it. I first bought one of another brand and it was a total disaster! Thank god I was able to return it and get this one instead. Great balancing board. Excellent for all ages. Its sturdy, and heavy but in a good way.
customer_reviews.author: Rog

customer_reviews.title: It WAS and still IS a great hit
customer_reviews.text: My twin granddaughters (2 1/2) and older granddaughter (6) absolutely love this very sturdy and well-crafted activity board. They have found many creative ways to explore and experience it. It's a great indoor activity, helps them build strong core muscles and enhances their balance.
customer_reviews.author: sel-mi

customer_reviews.title: Best open ended toy ever
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this for a total of 20 minutes and I already know it’s the best toy ever. Video included for why... she’s going to use this nonstop for years!!!
customer_reviews.author: Harvey

customer_reviews.title: hours of fun!!
customer_reviews.text: my husband was very hesitant to get this because of the price and simplicity of it. this has been by far one of the most played with toys in our home since we got it (my husband included!) my kids use it daily! one of the best investments we have made! and even after all the playing it still looks brand new!
customer_reviews.author: MaliS

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Keep in mind this is just a curved piece of wood. It is high quality though. Woods great on our carpet, wood, and grass. Holds adult weight just fine. My toddler isn’t I love with it as much as I had hoped but it’s gotten some attention which is all I could ask for. Very easy to accidentally smash fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality could be better
customer_reviews.text: The box looks like it's been opened and there are some unsightly stains on the wood on an otherwise nice and sturdy board.
customer_reviews.author: JoVS

customer_reviews.title: Great versatile Toy
customer_reviews.text: Great toy that will last years unlike the cheap plastic crap that’s out there for kids. All four of my kids ages 1 to 6 play with this and they use it to rock on as well as build forts with it. One of those toys I’ll keep for my grandkids to play with some day.
customer_reviews.author: Popmakr4

customer_reviews.title: Very open ended
customer_reviews.text: So open ended! My son is 2.5 and this can be used for many years. Even I like to play with it! I did use a little wood conditioner as it felt a little rough coming out of the box. I’d also love to get the rubber pieces for the bottom to make it not slide on our wood floors
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superb customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing rocker board! Super durable! Great value, especially compared to other similar products on the market. Had trouble finding the color we wanted. Emailed kinderfeets customer care and they were prompt and professional and made one available in the color we wanted! Superb customer service! Feels great to support them. Will def buy more of their products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for imaginative play!
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren (ages 4, 8 and 9) all enjoy this and have been very creative in its use. Two of them will sit on the ends and rock it; another time, it’s a turtle shell! A great “toy” that allows them to use their imagination. My daughter (35+) enjoys lying on it and stretching her back!
customer_reviews.author: BLS

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: These are just great! Perfect for all ages. My kids find a million ways to play with this thing including bean bags and whatever else. Also my husband started taking it to exercise at his standing desk.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Porter

customer_reviews.title: Kid Magnet
customer_reviews.text: Every time I have this out any kid that enters my house is drawn to it. It’s such a fun open ended toy. I bought it for my now 2 year old and 5 year old. I love how both kids can balance and rock on it developing balance and core strength. I think it’s fun too.
customer_reviews.author: J. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Kids and Adults
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 18 month old and his 3 year old brother. They both love it. They rock, they slide, they use it as a chair. My husband and I like to rock on it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Holly H

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and practical
customer_reviews.text: My 23 month old child already has figured out many ways to use this wobble board. It’s so solid I can easily rock on it. Sometimes we even do story time on it rocking together. It’s fantastic!!
customer_reviews.author: Hilary

customer_reviews.title: Versatile for play
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves this to go with his Nuggets. He uses it as a slide, balance board, ramp, and everything in between.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very fun toy. I’m trying to pair down and simplify our toy situation by swapping out lots of cheap toys for one good toy on birthdays and holidays. I got this for my two year old on her birthday. She loves it! Luckily our playroom is carpeted because it’s a little hazardous for little fingers on hard flooring but we’ve had no issues on the carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Longstreet

customer_reviews.title: Best present ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best present ever! Our kids love it. No they more than love it, they fight over it. We bought this with the youngest (3 years) in mind. But the 6 and 10 years old enjoy it just as much. Made us wonder if we should buy more boards. It is great to watch them discover new possibilities every day, from a balancing board it transforms into an indoor slide, to a racetrack, a theater, and so on.
customer_reviews.author: Marieke P

customer_reviews.title: Solid and Fun
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and lots of fun! Definitely a good product and worth as much as more expensive comparable products.
customer_reviews.author: ERT NYC

customer_reviews.title: Not a huge fan
customer_reviews.text: Did not love this one as it is heavy and caused a finger injury to my son. Can be fun but I only see injuries with this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Great for imaginative play!
customer_reviews.text: Great! We love it, even the adults can't resist playing on it! We've used it as a slide, ramp for the cars, step to leap off of, bridge, as well as its original use for balancing on! It's played with daily!
customer_reviews.author: HaleyBailery

customer_reviews.title: Best balance board for the money!
customer_reviews.text: High quality and the kids love it. Definitely recommend. No need to spend $200+ to get a balance board. This is the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and nice looking to boot!
customer_reviews.text: Wish these weren't so pricey but we absolutely love ours! Very sturdy and nice looking as well!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Multiuse
customer_reviews.text: 4 year old and 8 year old seem to enjoy, but may have seen more use with younger kids (baby-toddler on up)... It’s been fun to use with building blocks and forts as well.
customer_reviews.author: zeebz05

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and fun toy!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect toy for playing inside. Right away my older son jumped on it and was balancing. My 2.5 loves laying down on it and rocking back and forth. We have only had it for a couple of days and they already used it in so many ways like using it as tunnel for their cars or a place for their stuffed animals. And I love that it's a beautiful and quality toy made of natural wood that fits in our living room.
customer_reviews.author: Lima2020

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for our two-year-old grandson. He has had endless fun with it as has his three-year-old sister. It’s one of those toys that you don’t mind leaving out because it is so beautiful. It’s very sturdy and safe and inspires creative play.
customer_reviews.author: NC girl

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy!
customer_reviews.text: Our kids play with this all of the time. We got it for the baby, but all the kids, up to 8 years old, are always finding some way to incorporate it. Highly recommended, imaginative toy!
customer_reviews.author: TurboFantasticMan

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL
customer_reviews.text: LOVE OUR BOARD!!! Wonderful purchase. My 3yo and 8mo love playing with this toy.. even I do! It has been a boat, a bed, a chair, a doll crib, a surf board, bridge, slide... you won’t regret this!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Diley

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my almost 4 year old twin grand daughters. They loved it and all the adults tried it too. The adults liked it to do some quick balance and leg work exercise! Anytime anyone passed by it during Christmas week they stopped and rocked!
customer_reviews.author: Lois J Peterson

customer_reviews.title: So many possibilities!
customer_reviews.text: This is used by my kids that are 12, 5, and 2. My 2 year old loves it especially. There are many possibilites for this toy and it is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: ThomFam

customer_reviews.title: I thought it was just an expensive board
customer_reviews.text: Wife wanted it, I thought it was just an expensive board. "Lo and behold" the kids love it & get exercise in front of the TV too! Go figure :)
customer_reviews.author: G.A.

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but good investment...
customer_reviews.text: Bit expensive, but my child loves it. It does provide a lot of room for being creative.
customer_reviews.author: Arrash

customer_reviews.title: and I am so glad to finally purchase it for him
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves this wobble board! We are a montessori family and this has been on our wish list for a while, and I am so glad to finally purchase it for him. The construction is impeccable and the open ended opportunites are limitless. Already he has used it as a seat, rocked on it with his feet, jumped off it and used it as a bridge for his trucks.
customer_reviews.author: VRD

customer_reviews.title: Discolored & spotty rough finush
customer_reviews.text: State board I received had grayish discoloration in the wood and one end of the board was not sanded and finished leaving it roughed unlike the other end.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Ohmes

customer_reviews.title: Quality product. Well made.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my 1 1/2 yr old grandson 4 Christmas & he just loves it! He rocks back & forth on it or turns it over & walks across it like a bridge. Great balance tool!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this and is so creative in how he plays with it!
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made board
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this board! They use their imagination while playing with it: It's a boat, a shield, rocking chair, a mountain, etc. It's beautifully made and very sturdy. Just like the balance bikes Kinderfeets makes. We use it inside as well as outside, for example to go over it with the balance bikes. Or as part of an obstacle course. It's also easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: F. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: One of our favorite toys!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality! My 4 year old loves it, she uses it as a balance board and also gets creative with it. This is our car ramp, bridge, cave, the possibilities are endless. It's wonderful seeing the creativity!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and a creative toy. My daughter use is as a "boat" and as a slide.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this and literally use it every day. It's so worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Julien

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: My son instantly started playing with this once he opened it for Christmas. He is a very active 2.5 year old. He balanced on it, used it as a tunnel for his cars and lounged on it to watch TV. Such a simple design yet brilliant toy.
customer_reviews.author: NikLP25

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, fun and adaptable
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 2 year old for Christmas and he’s obsessed! My husband and I also enjoy hoping on to balance. I also use it flipped over to help get into my sons crib when he asks for cuddles before bed. Brilliant; very handy
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: interesting
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for the kids. But I tried on it as well. Honestly speaking, I see it as a very interesting tool or toy. I even think of it as a companion for standing desk.
customer_reviews.author: Jolin

customer_reviews.title: 4 year olds really enjoy it
customer_reviews.text: Needed 2 because they are twins and fight about using it.
customer_reviews.author: ssstokes

customer_reviews.title: Never Gets Old
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite toy my children have. We all play with it - adults and children alike - in so many different ways. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: TheGoodWitch

customer_reviews.title: Lovely board, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome balance board. My son loves it and so do I. I’m 114 pounds and my son is 40 pounds and it holds both of us at the same time. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: kyrstin

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: Best gift my kids(18months and 4yr) have ever received! They use it daily and in so many different ways. Rocker, bridge, slide, car ramp, etc. And I can join in when they ask me to try since it holds up to 485lbs!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great open ended toy!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old son loves this toy! It's been used as a slide, table, fort, rocker, bridge etc.. He plays with it very often.
customer_reviews.author: dita

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and inspiring!
customer_reviews.text: Three-year old granddaughter loves this and uses it in multiple ways.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy R. McQuay

customer_reviews.title: Not Fun At All
customer_reviews.text: Can't do much with the board and it takes a lot space. My kid lost interest in it quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Miequeen

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love this board! My 2.5 year old loves to use it as a slide currently. He is in major climbing mode and I’m so glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Reaux

customer_reviews.title: Creative toy with many uses for all ages
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, even for adults. My daughter comes up with many uses for it! Did have some splintering at edges shortly after using, but doesn’t seem to effect use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Countless fun
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the money. My 2 yr-old loves it. There are so many ways to place with it.
customer_reviews.author: T. R.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdiness
customer_reviews.text: I got thing for my Grandson 2nd birthday and he loved it (so did his dad)\. well built and should last through several more grandkids.
customer_reviews.author: bigfoot

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this so much best toy purchase so far
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Lander

customer_reviews.title: My kids love this and how open ended it is
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny. My kids love this and how open ended it is.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley Manning

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My 16 month old son loves it! He uses it like a surf board and lays down inside the curve of it like a rocking chair!
customer_reviews.author: keely miranda wagner

customer_reviews.title: Balance bridge
customer_reviews.text: Super fun and just what its supposed to do! My 3 and 5 yr love it. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Crisp M.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Our one year old loves climbing on, rocking on, and sliding down!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super strong and beautiful to boot
customer_reviews.text: This is even better then expected. Super smooth and wood grain is clean and rounded as pictured. Shipped here no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 2 & 5 yo and they love it!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea OBrien

customer_reviews.title: Such a great open ended toy
customer_reviews.text: We bought two, our grandchildren play on them constantly. Sometimes it's a bridge, rocking bench and even a slide. Such a great open ended toy.
customer_reviews.author: linda burt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing toy with so many possibilities. Fun for older kids and younger tots. Super sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: erin edgar

customer_reviews.title: Great product. My adventures 13 month old loves it
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipment. Great product. My adventures 13 month old loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Stedman

customer_reviews.title: Cautiously optimistic
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived with a few scratches and blemishes, disappointing at this price point. My 20 month old loves it and was able to discover many ways to use it without guidance. I was surprised at how unstable and slippery it was on a hard floor, much safer on a soft surface like a carpet (we used a quilt). Also not safe to use in an arch (bridge) position as the rounded edges cause the board to tilt over dangerously. Overall, less safe than I expected and lower quality that I assumed. Intend to allow him to continue use under extreme supervision.
customer_reviews.author: charles

customer_reviews.title: Love the board
customer_reviews.text: Love the board. Both the 5 year old and 2 year old play with it daily. But ours arrived with blemishes and scratches. Upset that we paid full price for seconds quality.
customer_reviews.author: gbark3

product_meta.title: Kinderfeets, Kinderboard, Waldorf Original Wooden Balance Board for Toddlers, Kids, Teens, Adults (Natural)
product_meta.description:
Color:Natural

Our German beechwood Kinderboard is Dutch designed and excellent for stimulating child development—both physical and mental—and offers open-ended play opportunities for toddlers, children, teens, and even adults. It can hold up to 220kg or 485lbs! The Kinderboard has water-based lacquer and can be used both indoors and out, great for rainy and sunny days at home or in a school environment.

This multi-use toy piece was originally used by many children as well as our Kinderfeets creator in Waldorf early childhood classrooms. It was created to help children develop a sense of balance, stimulate their vestibular system, and gain a deep sense of awareness of their body and body parts.

Watch the child’s imagination take over once their Kinderboard arrives. It becomes a seesaw, a balance board, a slide, a step stool, a boat, a resting place, a doll bed, a puppet stage, a tunnel and many more opportunities for them to explore. The possibilities are endless—and truly up to them!
feature_bullets: BUILDS CONFIDENCE AND BALANCE - Kinderfeets' Kinderboards are created to help children develop a sense of balance, stimulate their vestibular system, and gain a deep sense of awareness of the body and its parts. It stimulates early childhood development on both physical and mental aspects while offering open-ended play opportunities.

ENCOURAGES CREATIVITY - Watch your child’s imagination take over once their Kinderboard arrives. They can use it as a seesaw, a balancing board, a slide, a step stool, a boat, a resting place, a doll bed, a puppet stage, a tunnel, and anything that they could ever imagine. The possibilities are endless, and truly up to them.

PREMIUM BUILT - These heavy-duty boards assure long-lasting use and durability. Each board is carefully handcrafted to make sure of its premium built and safety of use. Suitable for toddlers, children, teens, and even adults weighing up to 220 kilos or 485 pounds.

UNFADING QUALITY - With its water-based lacquer, Kinderboards can be used both indoors and outdoors without worry. Rain or shine, you can't stop your little ones from enjoying these fun balance boards at home or in school.
ENVIRONMENTALLY FRIENDLY - These wooden boards use eco-friendly stains, water-based lacquers, and timber that are also FSC-certified, and meets Australian standards, EU standards and US standards.
